function.name: powerShell
function.description: Adds a [build step](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/PowerShell) running PowerShell script @see PowerShellStep

param.name: jetbrains_powershell_minVersion
param.deprecated: This property allows to specify a limited number of versions, please use minRequiredVersion instead.

param.name: jetbrains_powershell_minVersion
param.description: A minimum required PowerShell version installed on a build agent

param.name: jetbrains_powershell_errorToError
param.description: Specifies how the error output is handled. If set to true any output to stderr is handled as an error. By default any output to stderr is handled as a warning.

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Build working directory](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Build+Working+Directory) for ant script, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Build+Checkout+Directory).

option.name: file
option.description: Run a PowerShell script at the given path

param.name: jetbrains_powershell_script_file
param.description: A path to the script to run

option.name: script
option.description: Run a PowerShell script with the given content

param.name: jetbrains_powershell_noprofile
param.description: Whether the script should be executed with the -NoProfile added

param.name: jetbrains_powershell_additionalArguments
param.description: Additional arguments to be passed to PowerShell

option.name: PS1
option.description: Run script with the -ExecutionPolicy ByPass argument to enable arbitrary scripts execution

option.name: Core
option.description: Open-source edition based on .Net Core, cross-platform, 64-bit only

option.name: Desktop
option.description: Closed-source edition bundled with Windows, available only on Windows platforms.
